Title: Jitsuroku Andô Noboru kyôdô-den: Rekka
Actors: Riki Takeuchi, Ryôsuke Miki, Ken'ichi Endô, Mika Katsumura
Plot: After Kunisada's Yakuza leader and father figure is brutally murdered, he and his best friend go on a two-man mission to avenge his death, killing other Yakuza leaders leading to a final confrontation by the old man's killers.
